text: Surely it won't be long before the Kardashian - Jenner children have their own reality show, judging by their continued domination on social media. To celebrate True Thompson's half - birthday, Khlo√© Kardashian threw the most adorable ` ` Cousin Cupcake Party'' for the babies in the family. And as usual, the Kardashians prove themselves to be the world's party planners extraordinaire, from the decadent looking snacks, to the gorgeous decorations. Sitting on a pink blanket, next to a plate of the cutest cupcakes, baby True is surrounded by all of her baby cousins.
